units.title: Lentiviral transduction of hiPSCs at day 15
units.text: hiPSCs were transduced with a lentiviral vector encoding FLP under the control of the CDH1 promoter at day 15 before analysis at day 24.
units.rationale: Introduces FLP recombinase for lineage tracing at a defined differentiation stage.

units.title: Inducible FLP expression at day 3 and 4‑OHT treatment
units.text: For JCF lineage tracing, epicardioids from this reporter line were transduced with a lentiviral vector encoding an inducible FLP (FLPERT2) under the control of the MAB21L2 promoter at day 3, and 4-hydroxytamoxifen (4-OHT) was applied at the beginning of the JCF stage (days 7–8).
units.rationale: Activates FLP recombinase in early JCF cells to label their progeny.

units.title: Verification of labeling after 72 h
units.text: After 72 h, we detected HA-tag+CDH1+ cells, indicating correct labeling of the mesothelial layer.
units.rationale: Confirms successful recombination and specific labeling of target cells.

units.title: Immunofluorescence analysis at day 12
units.text: On day 12, immunofluorescence analysis revealed HA-tag+ CMs and epicardial cells (both mesothelial and EPDCs), confirming the dual fate potential of epicardial cells.
units.rationale: Validates the differentiation outcomes of labeled mesothelial cells.

units.title: ISL1 immunostaining in human fetal heart tissue
units.text: we performed ISL1 immunostaining in human fetal heart tissue to verify this finding.
units.rationale: Checks expression of the ISL1 marker in native epicardial tissue.

units.title: Subclustering of metacell clusters for JCF timing
units.text: we performed subclustering of metacell clusters categorized as FHF progenitors (mainly cluster 9) to investigate the timing of JCF progenitors.
units.rationale: Analyzes cell populations to map the emergence of JCF cells.

units.title: Effect of 4‑OHT timing on fate outcomes
units.text: 78.4% of HA-tag+ cells were CMs compared to 54.7% when applying 4-OHT at the JCF stage (days 4–5).
units.rationale: Demonstrates how induction timing influences lineage bias.

units.title: Multiplex immunostaining at day 24
units.text: Immunostaining for the HA tag, the CM marker cTnT and the mesenchymal marker vimentin (top) or the HA tag, vimentin and the SMC marker calponin (CNN1; bottom) in infected organoids at day 24;
units.rationale: Visualizes multiple lineage markers to assess differentiation within organoids.

units.title: CellRank inference of terminal macrostates
units.text: CellRank47 to infer the terminal macrostates (myocytic, epicardial, endothelial and endodermal) and the probability of each cell to transition toward these states based on both pseudotime and RNA velocity.
units.rationale: Computationally determines cell fate trajectories from single‑cell data.

units.title: Generation of AAVS1‑FRT‑STOP‑mKate2‑HA reporter line
units.text: AAVS1-FRT-flanked STOP-mKate2-HA reporter line was knocked into the AAVS1 safe harbor locus.
units.rationale: Creates a genetic construct enabling FLP‑mediated lineage tracing.
